TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit BuildDependencySet extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Represents dependencies returned by the build manager.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The BuildDependencySet object for an application can be retrieved through the <xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildManager.GetCachedBuildDependencySet%2A> method. It contains the properties that represent the list of dependencies.

Docs.summary: Gets a string representing the hash code of the dependent virtual paths.
Docs.value: A <xref:System.String> representing the hash code of the dependent virtual paths.
Docs.returns: A <xref:System.String> representing the hash code of the dependent virtual paths.

Docs.summary: Gets a list of virtual path dependencies.
Docs.value: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> containing the virtual path dependencies.
Docs.returns: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> containing the virtual path dependencies.
